description: Binary expansion of one of four fixed points (mod 1) of Minkowski's question mark function.
comments: Other fixed points (mod 1) are 0, 1/2 and 1-A048820. - Joseph Biberstine (jrbibers(AT)indiana.edu), Jun 10 2006
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 441-443.
links: S. R. Finch, Minkowski's Question Mark Function
